skill.name: Phenomenological Transformation
skill.value: Recovers 1248/1488 HP to all allies. Targets receive 54/64% less DMG for a limited time.

ability.name: Accumulation of Light (Lv. 27)
ability.value: Restores HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.

ability.name: Stone in the Dark (Lv. 75)
ability.value: Moderately increases all Anima team members' crit rate when this daemon is Team Leader.
